1.content:
Today is going to be killuas unnlucky day but he doesnt know it yet, how will this all take place?

the story choices are as follows, the final one is open for more scenarios, make sure to keep in that way for now.
1.title: Killuas Unlucky Day

11.content:
For as long as he can remember killua has always had a thing for humiliation, though he would never tell anyone this, afterall it would bring shame to his family. though part of him enjoyed that thought.

He would always wear embarassing underwear, to scared to go any further, though he mostly just wore his cartoon briefs. at times he would stroll around in just them in public though that was only at night when he knew he wouldnt be seen.
though today he was feeling a little more brave, today he decided to wear tight shorts over his underwear, his undies today were...
11.title: He has a humiliation kink

choices: Who could win at hide and seak
Who can hold their bladder longer?
12.content:
Not one to shy away from a bet killua quickly accepted one with Gon, with the condition that the loser has to do whatever the winner wants for the day.
Thinking Gon could never win Killua suggested that it should be for a week instead of just a day.
what was the bet?
12.title: He loses a bet

choices: trips in public and hurts someone
gets locked out of his apartment
goes to bed to avoid any more mishaps
14.content: Killua like any day woke up, got dressed and wore his favourite cartoon undies. it was going like any other day untill killua started to trip over things, at first it was just a lump in his rug, but he soon began tripping on other things such as sticks, old toys, banana peels and cracks in the pavement. it was like watching a cartoon, that was untill...
14.title: Hes just unlucky

choices: Gets in a disagreement with Gon
15.title: Other

choices: The other teenagers are able to fight now?
151.content:
It was like any other day for killua, he started living in a small village to get a break from adventuring. he would wake up, eat food, then go for a walk. he would commonly come across these teenages they couldnt be any younger than 17, he would tease one of them fairly often for being a cry baby. and today he did the same but something was off, the kid didnt storm off like usual he acted as if killua wasnt even there, just ignoring him. Annoyed killua stormed over to him but as he did he gets surrounded by the other teenagers.
it was at this moment everything changed...
151.title: The bully becomes the bullied

info.brief_description: An interactive story focusing on Killua in his humiliating adventure.
info.description:
Prepare killua for you now face a humiliating adventure, filled with wedgie diapers and all other forms of humiliation!

Rules:
1) this is a story for adults so minors be gone!
2) killua is the primary focus for this!
3) girls can be in the story but they cant be involed in any sexual behavior!
4) Killua will be interested in guys in this story!
5) make sure there multiple choice options!
6) be descriptive but dont force scenarios onto people when it could be branched off onto something else!
